bs-bluespiceabout-desc: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=ExtensionInfo}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=ExtensionInfo], description of BlueSpiceAbout extension
bs-bluespiceabout-about-bluespice: Label for a link in the left navigation. Not used in the extension itself, but by many installations in the wikitext content
bs-bluespiceabout-about-bluespice-page: Target for a link in the left navigation. Not used in the extension itself, but by many installations in the wikitext content
bluespiceabout: Label for special page in list of special pages
action-bluespiceabout-viewspecialpage:
Placeholder to describe that view of special page "{{int:bs-bluespiceabout-about-bluespice}}" is restricted for the current user
{{doc-action|bluespiceabout-viewspecialpage}}
right-bluespiceabout-viewspecialpage:
Grants access to the special page [[Special:BlueSpiceAbout]].
{{doc-right|bluespiceabout-viewspecialpage}}
